meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Shannon Lee Donnie Edgemon Alex Maggio Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7189.

td.p: Shannon Lee, an architectural design associate from Phoenixville, Pennsylvania
Donnie Edgemon, a management consultant from Sterling Park, Virginia
Alex Maggio, a writer originally from Cincinnati, Ohio (whose 2-day cash winnings total $40,301)

tr.td: LATIN AMERICAN HODGEPODGE
BESTSELLERS
PIPES & PIPERS
MOVIE LIFE HACKS
CRAIGS LIST
CLASSIFIED "AD"s

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 15):

tr.td: Alex
Donnie
Shannon

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Alex
Donnie
Shannon
TERM OF ART
AMERICAN HISTORY
RELIGIOUS BELIEF
ENDS IN DOUBLE LETTERS
FRENCH-SPEAKING COUNTRIES
HAPPY BIRTHDAY, FRANK SINATRA
(Alex: And in honor of his 100th birthday this weekend, [*], my favorite singer of all time.)
